title: Custom Type Specimen
content:
As I am collecting more and more fonts, I thought it would be nice to make my own type sampler.  
So far I have just used OS X Font Book to manage my fonts, but are currently planning to invest in a more professinal FontManager.  
Any good advise on that subject matter??  
Maybe one where you can create PDF files with previews of your font collection.

Thanx In Advance
